main event: The report details a UFO sighting observed by civilians in Panama City, Florida on 8 Mar 54, lasting 65 seconds, with the object changing shape every few seconds.
interesting points: The witnesses described the object changing shape from a cigar shape to a delta-wing appearance and then to a rounded, flat appearance, with varying colors.
There were 26 aircraft in the local area at the time of the sighting, and the local radar reported no unidentified sighting at that time.
A newspaper over the local radio station reported that a pilot had observed a large flock of birds shortly before the sighting, suggesting a possible alternate explanation.
The object was estimated to be approximately 35 inches in diameter, and its erratic flight pattern, stopping and starting again, made it an unidentified aerial phenomenon.
The witnesses appeared very sober, sincere, and good judges of altitude and distance, adding to the reliability of the sighting.
sighted object: Unidentified flying object (UFO) with changing shape and colors
photographs: No photographs included in the report
